name: 張文中
objective: 現代控制理論簡介、線性空間分析、狀態方程式及響應，可控制性及可觀測性、穩定性分析、狀態回授及估測、控制器設計及應用、觀測
schedule:
Week     Topic
1.(9/18) Introduction
2.(9/25) Background linear algebra
3.(10/2) Mathematical descriptions of systems
4.(10/9) Linearization
5.(10/16) State-space solutions
6.(10/23) Realizations
7.(10/30) Midterm examination (I)
8.(11/6) Stability of LTI systems
9.(11/13) Lyapunov theorem
10.(11/20) Controllability
11.(11/27) Observability
12.(12/4) Coprime fractions
13.(12/11) Midterm examination (II)
14.(12/18) Minimal realizations
15.(12/25) State feedback
16.(1/1) State estimators
17.(1/8) Pole placement
18.(1/15) Final exam
scorePolicy: The final grade will be a weighted average of homework+quizzes 25%, midterms 50%(25%+25%), and final 25%.
materials: Linear System Theory and Design - Third Edition, Chi-Tsong Chen, Oxford University Press, 1999
